title: Magical staff
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                           | Magical staff (type varies) |
| :--------------------------------------------- | --------------------------- |
| Skill                                          | [Staves](/Staves "Staves")  |
| [Damage](/Weapon_damage "Weapon damage")       | 5                           |
| Accuracy                                       | +5                          |
| [Base delay](/Weapon_speed "Weapon speed") (%) | 12 (120%)                   |
| [Min delay](/Minimum_delay "Minimum delay")    | 6 at skill 12               |
| [Hands](/Handedness "Handedness")              | 1H                          |
| Size                                           | Large                       |
| Ranged?                                        | No                          |

|   |                                                        |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A staff improved with arcane powers of unknown nature. |

A [magical staff]() is a device which increases the power of a certain school of spells. It can also be used as a melee weapon, with magical effects.

## Useful Info

Magical staves are [spell enhancers](/Spell_enhancer "Spell enhancer"), increasing [spell power](/Spell_power "Spell power") of a given school by up to x150%. Due to a [stepdown](/Spell_power#Stepdown "Spell power") in calculations, you'll generally receive less than x150%, especially if power is already high. This stacks multiplicatively with other spell enhancers, up to 3.

Unlike normal weapons, magical staves cannot be enchanted or [branded](/Brand "Brand") in any way. Instead, they can deal elemental damage, based on skill in [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations") and the corresponding [magic school](/Magic_school "Magic school").

> **Damage Dealt**: 0 to 1.25×(School+\[Evocations/2])  
> **Chance to Activate**: (Evocations + School/2)×6.66% per hit

- [Staff of fire](/Staff_of_fire "Staff of fire") ([Fire Magic](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic")): [Fire](/Fire "Fire") damage, grants [rF+](/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance").
- [Staff of cold](/Staff_of_cold "Staff of cold") ([Ice Magic](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic")): [Cold](/Cold "Cold") damage, grants [rC+](/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance").
- [Staff of earth](/Staff_of_earth "Staff of earth") ([Earth Magic](/Earth_Magic "Earth Magic")): Physical damage (+20% more than usual), which [flying](/Fly "Fly") enemies resist.
- [Staff of air](/Staff_of_air "Staff of air") ([Air Magic](/Air_Magic "Air Magic")): [Electricity](/Electricity "Electricity") damage, grants [rElec](/Electricity_resistance "Electricity resistance").
- [Staff of alchemy](/Staff_of_poison "Staff of poison") ([Alchemy](/Alchemy "Alchemy")): `50 + Alchemy×12.5`% chance to [poison](/Poison "Poison") the target (can even affect poison-resistant living targets, but has to pass a Skill/16 chance), grants [rPois](/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance").
- [Staff of death](/Staff_of_death "Staff of death") ([Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy")): `12.5 + Necromancy×12.5`% chance of [negative energy](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") damage (does not affect targets with [negative energy resistance](/Negative_energy_resistance "Negative energy resistance") or [drain](/Drain "Drain") the target), grants [rN+](/Negative_energy_resistance "Negative energy resistance").
- [Staff of conjuration](/Staff_of_conjuration "Staff of conjuration") ([Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations")): Irresistible damage. No resistance.

[Randart](/Randart "Randart") staves can boost multiple different types of spells.

[Unrandart](/Unrandart "Unrandart") staves are classified as weapons in the inventory screen rather than magical staves, whether or not they add any enhancers.

|                                                           | Image                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| --------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Standard**                                              | [![Magic staff 1.png](/images/0/09/Magic_staff_1.png)](/File:Magic_staff_1.png) [![Magic staff 2.png](/images/6/62/Magic_staff_2.png)](/File:Magic_staff_2.png) [![Magic staff 3.png](/images/3/3e/Magic_staff_3.png)](/File:Magic_staff_3.png) [![Magic staff 4.png](/images/7/7c/Magic_staff_4.png)](/File:Magic_staff_4.png) [![Magic staff 5.png](/images/5/5d/Magic_staff_5.png)](/File:Magic_staff_5.png) [![Magic staff 6.png](/images/6/6c/Magic_staff_6.png)](/File:Magic_staff_6.png) [![Magic staff 7.png](/images/e/eb/Magic_staff_7.png)](/File:Magic_staff_7.png) [![Magic staff 8.png](/images/2/27/Magic_staff_8.png)](/File:Magic_staff_8.png) [![Magic staff 9.png](/images/0/0b/Magic_staff_9.png)](/File:Magic_staff_9.png) [![Magic staff 10.png](/images/0/0f/Magic_staff_10.png)](/File:Magic_staff_10.png) |
| **Artefact**                                              | [![Artefact magic staff 1.png](/images/c/cb/Artefact_magic_staff_1.png)](/File:Artefact_magic_staff_1.png) [![Artefact magic staff 2.png](/images/b/b9/Artefact_magic_staff_2.png)](/File:Artefact_magic_staff_2.png) [![Artefact magic staff 3.png](/images/a/ab/Artefact_magic_staff_3.png)](/File:Artefact_magic_staff_3.png) [![Artefact magic staff 4.png](/images/0/0b/Artefact_magic_staff_4.png)](/File:Artefact_magic_staff_4.png) [![Artefact magic staff 5.png](/images/8/8d/Artefact_magic_staff_5.png)](/File:Artefact_magic_staff_5.png) [![Artefact magic staff 6.png](/images/a/a1/Artefact_magic_staff_6.png)](/File:Artefact_magic_staff_6.png) [![Artefact magic staff 7.png](/images/f/f6/Artefact_magic_staff_7.png)](/File:Artefact_magic_staff_7.png)                                                       |
|                                                           | **[Unrandart](/Unrandarts "Unrandarts")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| **[Staff of Olgreb](/Staff_of_Olgreb "Staff of Olgreb")** | [![New staff of olgreb.png](/images/2/29/New_staff_of_olgreb.png)](/File:New_staff_of_olgreb.png)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| **[Elemental Staff](/Elemental_Staff "Elemental Staff")** | [![New elemental staff.png](/images/a/af/New_elemental_staff.png)](/File:New_elemental_staff.png)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), randart magical staves couldn't boost multiple spell schools.
- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), magical staves could not be [randarts](/Randart "Randart").
- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), magical staves could be [cursed](/Cursed "Cursed"), like other weapons.
- In [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), [staves of summoning](/Staff_of_summoning "Staff of summoning"), [wizardry](/Staff_of_wizardry "Staff of wizardry"), and [energy](/Staff_of_energy "Staff of energy") were removed. Staves of conjuration got the melee effect of staves of earth (irresistible damage that's reduced by [AC](/AC "AC") once); staves of earth got a higher base damage, but with the shrapnel effect of being affected 3 times by [AC](/AC "AC").
- In [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), [staves of power](/Staff_of_power "Staff of power") were removed.
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), staves of fire, earth, air, and cold would act as negative [spell enhancers](/Spell_enhancer "Spell enhancer") for their opposing elemental school.
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), staves of summoning granted the [warding](/Warding "Warding") property.
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), staves of summoning could abjure summoned creatures in melee.
- In [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), the [Staff of channeling](/Staff_of_channeling "Staff of channeling") was removed. Its ability to channel MP was given to [staves of energy](/Staff_of_energy "Staff of energy").
- In [0.12](/0.12 "0.12"), the [Staff of enchantment](/Staff_of_enchantment "Staff of enchantment"), which enhanced the power of [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") and [Charms](/Charms "Charms"), was removed.
- Prior to [0.8](/0.8 "0.8"), the chance of a magical staff auto-identifying when wielded depended on the skill of the wielder in its corresponding school (or [Spellcasting](/Spellcasting "Spellcasting") if none applied).

## See Also

- [Staves](/Staves "Staves")
- [Rods](/Rods "Rods") and [List of rods](/List_of_rods "List of rods")
- [Evocable staves](/Evocable_items#Staves "Evocable items")
- [Unrandart staves](/List_of_unrands#Staves "List of unrands")

| [Weapons](/Weapon "Weapon")                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Axes](/Axes "Axes")                                 | [Battleaxe](/Battleaxe "Battleaxe") • [Broad axe](/Broad_axe "Broad axe") • [Executioner's axe](/Executioner%27s_axe "Executioner's axe") • [Hand axe](/Hand_axe "Hand axe") • [War axe](/War_axe "War axe")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") | [Club](/Club "Club") • [Demon whip](/Demon_whip "Demon whip") • [Dire flail](/Dire_flail "Dire flail") • [Eveningstar](/Eveningstar "Eveningstar") • [Flail](/Flail "Flail") • [Giant club](/Giant_club "Giant club") • [Giant spiked club](/Giant_spiked_club "Giant spiked club") • [Great mace](/Great_mace "Great mace") • [Mace](/Mace "Mace") ([Hammer](/Hammer "Hammer")) • [Morningstar](/Morningstar "Morningstar") • [Sacred scourge](/Sacred_scourge "Sacred scourge") • [Whip](/Whip "Whip") |
| [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")            | [Demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") • [Double sword](/Double_sword "Double sword") • [Eudemon blade](/Eudemon_blade "Eudemon blade") • [Falchion](/Falchion "Falchion") • [Great sword](/Great_sword "Great sword") • [Long sword](/Long_sword "Long sword") • [Scimitar](/Scimitar "Scimitar") • [Triple sword](/Triple_sword "Triple sword")                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")                     | [Bardiche](/Bardiche "Bardiche") • [Demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident") • [Glaive](/Glaive "Glaive") • [Halberd](/Halberd "Halberd") ([Scythe](/Scythe "Scythe")) • [Spear](/Spear "Spear") • [Trident](/Trident "Trident") • [Trishula](/Trishula "Trishula")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")   | [Arbalest](/Arbalest "Arbalest") • [Hand cannon](/Hand_cannon "Hand cannon") • [Longbow](/Longbow "Longbow") • [Orcbow](/Orcbow "Orcbow") • [Shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow") • [Sling](/Sling "Sling") • [Triple crossbow](/Triple_crossbow "Triple crossbow")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [Short Blades](/Short_Blades "Short Blades")         | [Dagger](/Dagger "Dagger") • [Quick blade](/Quick_blade "Quick blade") • [Rapier](/Rapier "Rapier") • [Short sword](/Short_sword "Short sword")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Staves](/Staves "Staves")                           | [Lajatang](/Lajatang "Lajatang") • [Magical staff]() • [Quarterstaff](/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [Throwing](/Throwing "Throwing")                     | [Boomerang](/Boomerang "Boomerang") • [Dart](/Dart "Dart") • [Javelin](/Javelin "Javelin") • [Large rock](/Large_rock "Large rock") • [Stone](/Stone "Stone") • [Throwing net](/Throwing_net "Throwing net")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
html:
Magical staff

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Magical staff (type varies)
Skill Staves
Damage 5
Accuracy +5
Base delay (%) 12 (120%)
Min delay 6 at skill 12
Hands 1H
Size Large
Ranged? No
A staff improved with arcane powers of unknown nature.

A magical staff is a device which increases the power of a certain school of spells. It can also be used as a melee weapon, with magical effects.

Useful Info

Magical staves are spell enhancers, increasing spell power of a given school by up to x150%. Due to a stepdown in calculations, you'll generally receive less than x150%, especially if power is already high. This stacks multiplicatively with other spell enhancers, up to 3.

Unlike normal weapons, magical staves cannot be enchanted or branded in any way. Instead, they can deal elemental damage, based on skill in Evocations and the corresponding magic school.

Damage Dealt: 0 to 1.25×(School+[Evocations/2])
Chance to Activate: (Evocations + School/2)×6.66% per hit
  • Staff of fire (Fire Magic): Fire damage, grants rF+.
  • Staff of cold (Ice Magic): Cold damage, grants rC+.
  • Staff of earth (Earth Magic): Physical damage (+20% more than usual), which flying enemies resist.
  • Staff of air (Air Magic): Electricity damage, grants rElec.
  • Staff of alchemy (Alchemy): 50 + Alchemy×12.5% chance to poison the target (can even affect poison-resistant living targets, but has to pass a Skill/16 chance), grants rPois.
  • Staff of death (Necromancy): 12.5 + Necromancy×12.5% chance of negative energy damage (does not affect targets with negative energy resistance or drain the target), grants rN+.
  • Staff of conjuration (Conjurations): Irresistible damage. No resistance.

Randart staves can boost multiple different types of spells.

Unrandart staves are classified as weapons in the inventory screen rather than magical staves, whether or not they add any enhancers.

Image
Standard
Artefact
Unrandart
Staff of Olgreb
Elemental Staff

History

  • Prior to 0.31, randart magical staves couldn't boost multiple spell schools.
  • Prior to 0.30, magical staves could not be randarts.
  • Prior to 0.27, magical staves could be cursed, like other weapons.
  • In 0.26, staves of summoning, wizardry, and energy were removed. Staves of conjuration got the melee effect of staves of earth (irresistible damage that's reduced by AC once); staves of earth got a higher base damage, but with the shrapnel effect of being affected 3 times by AC.
  • In 0.25, staves of power were removed.
  • Prior to 0.19, staves of fire, earth, air, and cold would act as negative spell enhancers for their opposing elemental school.
  • Prior to 0.18, staves of summoning granted the warding property.
  • Prior to 0.17, staves of summoning could abjure summoned creatures in melee.
  • In 0.13, the Staff of channeling was removed. Its ability to channel MP was given to staves of energy.
  • In 0.12, the Staff of enchantment, which enhanced the power of Hexes and Charms, was removed.
  • Prior to 0.8, the chance of a magical staff auto-identifying when wielded depended on the skill of the wielder in its corresponding school (or Spellcasting if none applied).

See Also

  • Staves
  • Rods and List of rods
  • Evocable staves
  • Unrandart staves
Weapons
Axes Battleaxe • Broad axe • Executioner's axe • Hand axe • War axe
Maces & Flails Club • Demon whip • Dire flail • Eveningstar • Flail • Giant club • Giant spiked club • Great mace • Mace (Hammer) • Morningstar • Sacred scourge • Whip
Long Blades Demon blade • Double sword • Eudemon blade • Falchion • Great sword • Long sword • Scimitar • Triple sword
Polearms Bardiche • Demon trident • Glaive • Halberd (Scythe) • Spear • Trident • Trishula
Ranged Weapons Arbalest • Hand cannon • Longbow • Orcbow • Shortbow • Sling • Triple crossbow
Short Blades Dagger • Quick blade • Rapier • Short sword
Staves Lajatang • Magical staff • Quarterstaff
Throwing Boomerang • Dart • Javelin • Large rock • Stone • Throwing net
